title: "We Should All Grab A Drink" (Person of interest)(1 x 23)
author: Person of Interest Highlights
comment: The season just kept on getting better
it's funny how casual he blows up the car and then says they should go for a drink sometime
Everything was perfect in Poi; final scenes,songs, specially characters espacially elias,fusco ...
Great show, but the prop guy most have been having a laugh with that detonator.
Such a GREAT SHOW! Well written, and well acted.
description:
John, Carter and Fusco all peruse fleeing members of HR.
